alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Franklin; Hancock; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:08PM CDT until July 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wright County in north central Iowa... Northwestern Franklin County in north central Iowa... Southeastern Hancock County in north central Iowa... Southwestern Cerro Gordo County in north central Iowa... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Klemme, or 6 miles southwest of Garner, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Garner, Belmond, Klemme, Meservey, Goodell and Belmond Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
